Effect Blackaxe appears in Treerazer's hands, teleporting instantly from its prior location.

871udt0tIPBiUS63.name: Defoliation
871udt0tIPBiUS63.description:
Treerazer exudes a pulse of sickly green light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. All plants in the area (including creatures under the effect of his aura of corruption) blacken and wither. Non-creature plants immediately wither and die. Plant creatures take [[/r {20d8}[negative]]]{20d8 negative damage} with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:49|basic:true] save. A creature that fails its save is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for 1 minute and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3}. Treerazer can choose to exclude any number of plants in the area from this effect, and generally does so to preserve twisted and corrupted plants or fungi, or plant creatures that are allied to his cause.

Treerazer can't use Defoliation for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Defoliation]]{1d4 rounds}.

veNUDgghA30FdVNB.name: Dispelling Strike
veNUDgghA30FdVNB.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger Treerazer hits a creature, object, or spell effect with a weapon Strike or a defoliation attack.

Effect Treerazer casts his innate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, targeting the creature he hit with his Strike or one spell affecting that creature.

xkIBsOSynEo9Ii6k.name: Staggering Strike
xkIBsOSynEo9Ii6k.description: When Treerazer scores a critical hit with a melee attack, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Black Kobold Dragon Mage.name: 黑鳞狗头人龙术士 Black Kobold Dragon Mage
Black Kobold Dragon Mage.publicNotes:
Kobold dragon mages use magic to carry out their secret schemes. The presence of a dragon mage in a kobold warren is one of the greatest testaments to the kobolds' claim to draconic heritage.

Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids who carry physical similarities to true dragons. They lurk in dark spaces, usually tunnels and mines beneath the earth, in either warrens of their own design or complexes discovered and colonized after the original builders have moved on. Though kobolds are far more pragmatic than they are courageous, they use every inch of their cunning to even the playing field between themselves and other, stronger creatures. They attack from the darkness and at range, and kobold artificers and engineers master the art of simple but effective traps, which they use to protect their lairs. Kobolds are skilled at working together by necessity, and they often set up ambushes or hit-and-run assaults that allow them to do the most damage possible without being harmed in return.

Kobolds are diligent and hardworking creatures, though they often turn these virtues toward selfish ends. While some kobolds live in communal collectives that maintain neutral relations with the creatures around them, they can be easily swayed into serving malevolent powers or megalomaniac leaders. This is in part due to kobolds' innate pragmatism, as they would rather concede to servitude than risk being killed, but it is also in part due to a reverence for the power that kobolds generally lack. Dragons in particular are viewed with a deferential awe, and kobolds eagerly offer their services to such mighty and glorious creatures when they can. While kobolds may scheme against other leaders, especially those that control them via subjugation, dragons are usually viewed with adoration, no matter how brutal they might be to their kobold minions.

T9gLiofsJf3PXiHm.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
T9gLiofsJf3PXiHm.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

1GBTPnqIIGld3Wu1.name: Dragonscaled
1GBTPnqIIGld3Wu1.description:
A kobold dragon mage's resistance depends on the color of its scales:

  • Black acid 5

lFKVQJSD5lmRIdIT.name: Illusory Retreat
lFKVQJSD5lmRIdIT.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements The kobold dragon mage is adjacent to at least one enemy.

Effect The dragon mage creates an illusion of itself in its square and then becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} (with the effects of a 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} spell) for [[/br 1d4 #Duration Illusory Retreat]]{1d4 rounds}. The dragon mage can move up to half its Speed, but it must end its movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemies.

This is a 1st-level spell that requires a somatic component.

2jnfsvQ0IphAdWs2.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
2jnfsvQ0IphAdWs2.description:
The dragon mage deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Dhampir Wizard.name: 吸血裔法师 Dhampir Wizard
Dhampir Wizard.allSaves: +2 circumstance to all saves vs. disease
Dhampir Wizard.publicNotes:
This dhampir is a svetocher, the child of a moroi vampire.

As the mortal offspring of a vampire and a living parent, dhampirs occupy an unusual place among the living. Their vampiric parentage lends them elongated incisors, an unearthly beauty and physical grace, a ghostly pallor, and a piercing gaze. Perhaps their most distinctive feature, however, is their connection to negative energy, which heals them, leaving them as vulnerable to positive energy as any undead creature. Though they don't suffer the full range of a vampire's vulnerabilities, they do share certain characteristics with their vampire parent, leading to several distinct dhampir heritages across Golarion. By far the most common dhampirs are svetocher, the children of the more common moroi vampires.

Many dhampirs lived their childhoods as orphans, often because their mortal parents believed their child to be cursed and abandoned them, or perished as a result of a difficult childbirth. Often outcast, some dhampirs leverage their charisma and personal magnetism to manipulate those around them, while others struggle to form relationships. Frequent mistrust of a dhampir's parentage present further challenges when dhampirs attempt to integrate into mortal society. Those who seek out their vampiric parent instead often find themselves considered inferior, rejected as they were with regular mortals but for different reasons. But in regions like Nidal, Geb, and Ustalav, where vampires themselves carry some degree of respect, dhampirs can sometimes find their heritage empowering.

Dhampirs fill countless roles within many communities. Some prefer to blend in as best they can, holding regular jobs and building families (most children born to dhampirs share an ancestry with the dhampir's mortal parent, but a rare few are born as dhampirs themselves). Those who learn to make the most of their inherited charm can achieve a high societal status, whether leveraging traditional avenues of power or gathering followers enamored by the dhampir's abilities. With a lifespan rivaling that of an elf, a dhampir can develop extensive influence and engage in long-reaching schemes of massive scope. Further, their ancestry lends them a proclivity to necromancy and the occult arts.

uLMLLh4CPm3V37Y6.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
uLMLLh4CPm3V37Y6.description:

wvIjsYC3zqSnr2SA.name: Spellbook Containing Their Prepared Spells
wvIjsYC3zqSnr2SA.description:
• Cantrips
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}
  • 1st level spells
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command}
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k34hDOfIIMAxNL4a]{Grim Tendrils}
    • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}

A spellbook holds the written knowledge necessary to learn and prepare various spells, a necessity for wizards (who typically get one for free) and a useful luxury for other spellcasters looking to learn additional spells. Each spellbook can hold up to 100 spells. The Price listed is for a blank spellbook.

4pcckxSu3lSKQKx9.name: +2 Circumstance to All Saves vs. Disease

J6pZtpCOYKA1AxsU.name: Blood of the Night
J6pZtpCOYKA1AxsU.description: The dhampir's penalty and Hit Point reduction from the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} condition are reduced as though the condition value were 1 lower.

Duergar Bombardier.name: 灰矮人掷弹手 Duergar Bombardier
Duergar Bombardier.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. magic
Duergar Bombardier.publicNotes:
Alchemy intrigues many duergars, and their cruel traditions often motivate them to experiment on slaves. Eager to inflict pain and justify the abuse as a method of expanding knowledge, duergar bombardiers often accompany slaver bands so they can have the first chance to select their next test subjects from captured victims. To duergar bombardiers, the lob of each bomb represents a new opportunity to observe how their targets react and record the results to enhance future modifications to their alchemical concoctions.

Deep beneath the surface, duergars stubbornly claim the ancestral subterranean homelands of the dwarves as their own, having refused to venture to the surface along with their modern dwarven cousins. An exiled dwarven deity named Droskar offered duergars salvation from the horrors of the Darklands, and in exchange duergars endlessly toil in his honor within their subterranean empire. Notorious slavers, duergars regularly raid other Darklands settlements as well as surface communities in constant search of living beings to task with endless amounts of work in their harsh and exhausting settlements.

Duergars are gray-skinned creatures, often referred to as 'ashen' by those surface dwarves willing to speak of them. These subterranean dwarves have a strong natural connection with cave-dwelling vermin, and it's common to see duergar caravans drawn by teams of immense beetles. Most duergars devote themselves to the worship of Droskar, a taskmaster of a god who demands back-breaking toil in addition to regular prayer. Duergar leadership often consists of powerful divine servants of Droskar, along with incredibly stout warriors whose martial prowess ensures they can overcome any direct threat to their rule. Almost every aspect of duergar society is controlled by a strict hierarchy of leadership, with taskmasters directing subordinates across all walks of life.

bjXxmJTfu45UygBo.name: 变巨术(仅限自身) Enlarge (Self Only)
bjXxmJTfu45UygBo.description:
受到魔法能量的强化，目标增大到大型。其装备随之增大，但是在脱离后会回复原始大小。该生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。其触及增加5尺（或者10尺，如果初始为超小型），并且它在近战伤害上获得+2状态加值。该法术对于大型或者更大的生物无效。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sPCWrhUHqlbGhYSD]{法术效果：变巨术}

升阶 (4环级) T该生物改为增长到超大型体型。该对近战伤害的状态加值增加到+4，生物的触及增加10尺（或者15尺，如果该生物初始为超小型）。该法术对超大型或者更大的生物无效。 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.41WThj17MZBXTO2X]{法术效果：变巨术 (升阶 4环级)}

升阶 (6环级) 选择2环级或者4环级版本的本法术，并将其效果应用于10个自愿生物。

XAeQDTuQiMg6MDpT.name: 隐形术(仅限自身) Invisibility (Self Only)
XAeQDTuQiMg6MDpT.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

fP5Iv5QbWHvLChA4.name: Infused Items
fP5Iv5QbWHvLChA4.description: A duergar bombardier's items listed as infused last for 24 hours, or until the next time they make their daily preparations.

bWytg8B4wFHQLuzN.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

ya7kmwsMyQI69FrG.name: Far Lobber
ya7kmwsMyQI69FrG.description: The duergar bombardier has a range increment of 30 feet with their bombs instead of 20 feet.

7brI3OuzocwPLZcW.name: 高速炼金 Quick Alchemy
7brI3OuzocwPLZcW.description: The duergar bombardier creates a single alchemical item from their formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the start of the duergar bombardier's next turn.

KyvMw6gZ8XlbMZI6.name: 高速投弹手 Quick Bomber
KyvMw6gZ8XlbMZI6.description: The duergar can use Interact to draw a bomb, then Strike with it.

Orc Warchief.name: 兽人酋长 Orc Warchief
Orc Warchief.publicNotes:
When orcs raid, the strongest is chosen as the leader, backed up by brothers, sisters, and other immediate family.

Orcs are violent, monstrous humanoids that live by the rule that might makes right. They amass in brutal warbands both large and small, decimating and robbing those unlucky enough to cross their path. Countless small settlements, outposts, and forts have fallen at the hands of orc raiders, whose fecundity and sheer destructiveness leave an indelible mark on the lands they conquer. Survivors of orc invasions are as likely to be fed to the orcs' war beasts as they are to be taken as slaves. Unspeakable atrocities await any outsiders brought back to orc encampments, and to many, death is a far more preferable outcome compared to capture by orcs.

Physically, orcs tower over most humanoids and look practically custom-made for violence with their rough flesh, sturdy bone, and iron-hard muscle. For all their tough looks, however, orcs are far from invincible. They lack the discipline to conduct large-scale campaigns, for one thing, and they typically lose their heads in the heat of battle. Even their skin scars easily-though this is a source of pride to the orc people, since scars signify strength and experience in battle. To orcs, the crisscross of old wounds are a much a badge of pride and honor as any beheaded foe or claimed trophy.

Orcs are a people of violent passions in all that they do, not just war. Bonds of blood are especially strong among orcs, and lineage is important. The strongest orc bands are typically made up of brothers and sisters in more than arms; orcs fight harder when they are protecting their own kinsfolk, and orc warriors will fight tirelessly to avenge fallen family members. This emphasis on bloodlines is not an altruistic one, however, and is in fact a double-edged sword. Orcs whose families have been killed find themselves at the bottom of the clan's totem pole, and even a famous chieftain can become powerless overnight if their brethren aren't there to back them up.

The chaotic and fractious nature of orc culture results in a great variety of beliefs, superstitions, and legacies among different clans. This cultural divergence causes substantial infighting among orc bands, in many cases preventing the rise of larger orc nations. It can also frustrate many attempts at diplomacy, as the taboos of one band may be commonplace and thoroughly accepted practices among others. Navigating a specific band's culture can often mean the difference between life and death to those who deal with orcs off the field of war. Although orcs, as a rule, rarely deal with outsiders, they recognize the benefits of trade and willingly swap resources with other violent peoples like hobgoblins, drow, and many humans.

00veaqCowh9RkTrj.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

yeHohyJSYfiTwghO.name: Battle Cry
yeHohyJSYfiTwghO.description:
Bellowing mightily, the warchief gives themself and all orc allies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls until the start of the orc warchief's next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.Yqq4AkZ9lrm4CcID]{Effect: Battle Cry}

Ancient Black Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 古黑龙施法者 Ancient Black Dragon (Spellcaster)
Ancient Black Dragon (Spellcaster).allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Ancient Black Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
Murderous tyrants of marshes, swamps, bogs, and fens, black dragons terrorize their domains with intense fervor. Gleefully sadistic, they rule their fetid principalities from a deep cave or otherwise isolated part of the swamp with a mix of lightning-quick raids and subterfuge. Their hatred for other creatures is as acidic as their breath weapons, and they rarely tolerate even other dragons of their kind-except perhaps to mate or temporarily collaborate to take down a mutual enemy.

Black dragons are amphibious-although they breathe air, their gills also allow them to breathe water. Their frills and fins make them accomplished swimmers, well suited to their wetland environments and submerged lairs. They're immune to the fetid water that comes as a result of their magical ability to corrupt water.

Black dragon lairs are as foul as their souls. The floors are littered with rotting meat, and plundered treasures line the muck and slime of their dank caves amid twisted roots and creepers. Such places are often crawling with pests, snakes, and slimes. Though they claim natural caverns when they can, they make do with areas of dense, twisted vegetation within a swamp. Black dragon treasure hoards primarily consist of gems and expensive glass work, as valuables of softer substance can't survive the dragon's acidic presence.

While there are many types of dragons, from the powerful planar dragons to the strange esoteric dragons, few dragon varieties are as well-known and as rightly feared as the chromatic dragons. Differentiated by the hue of their scales, each color of dragon unleashes its own flavor of murderous cruelty-be it by claw, tooth, or breath-and unlike most creatures, dragons only become more powerful as they age. Their lust for treasure, food, bloodshed, and control are legendary. Physically powerful with egos to match, these dragons are often morally depraved and act as criminal masterminds, vicious tyrants, or voracious raiders.

lo9zjzoOZSRs5svZ.name: 黑暗术(随意施法) Darkness (At Will)
lo9zjzoOZSRs5svZ.description:
你创造一片黑暗的帷幕，光线无法穿透，并且光源无法在区域中发光。光线无法进入该区域，并且任何非魔法光源，例如火炬或者提灯，在区域中不会发出任何光线，即使其光照可能到达黑暗术之外也是如此。这也会压制等于或低于你的黑暗术环级的魔法光亮。光线无法穿透，所以在区域中的生物无法看到外面。对于外面，这看起来如同一团纯粹黑暗的球。

升阶 (4环级) 即使具有黑暗视觉的生物（但不包括高等黑暗视觉）也几乎无法看穿这黑暗。它们透过黑暗看到的生物视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Jdobn3sH6Hk5LLwy.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
Jdobn3sH6Hk5LLwy.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

D4C1yHkCqpQckxgr.name: Tail Lash
D4C1yHkCqpQckxgr.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the dragon's tail takes an action to Strike or attempt a skill check

Effect The dragon Strikes with its tail at the triggering creature at a -2 penalty. If it hits, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering roll.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.QqC9xymSXSVunDgl]{Effect: Tail Lash (Attack Roll)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.4HJJdogS751Z04lD]{Effect: Tail Lash (Skill Check)}

GeAJNEdtRdXSvZvk.name: Breath Weapon
GeAJNEdtRdXSvZvk.description:
The dragon breathes a spray of acid that deals [[/r {17d6}[acid]]]{17d6 acid damage} in a @Template[type:line|distance:100]{100 foot line} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:39|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

SRv8Gjga6DHY4U8G.name: Corrupt Water
SRv8Gjga6DHY4U8G.description:
Frequency Once per day

Effect The dragon permanently befouls 10 cubic feet of liquid within 90 feet. The liquid becomes undrinkable and unable to support water-breathing life.

This destroys liquid magic or alchemical items if they're of a lower level than the dragon (a creature can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:35] save to protect liquids in its possession). This doesn't affect liquids in a creature's body.

Ancient Bronze Dragon.name: 古青铜龙 Ancient Bronze Dragon
Ancient Bronze Dragon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Ancient Bronze Dragon.publicNotes:
Bronze dragons are among the most common of metallic dragons and the most likely to ally with mortals on worthy quests. However, they are naturally scholarly creatures who would rather remain in their lairs studying esoteric lore than go off on a wild adventure. These aloof and stoic dragons also act as preservationists, guarding storehouses of ancient lore from destruction or perversion. Bronze dragons are principled and protective, but while their silver cousins are quick to crusade for justice, bronze dragons prefer to find an important location worthy of their protection and guard it against any attack or unwelcome intrusion.

Bronze dragons' mastery over water and affinity for electricity means they are a boon to sailors caught in thunderstorms. A bronze dragon's enemies quickly discover neither cloudy sky nor turbulent sea provides shelter from their wrath. Bronze dragons lair along shorelines, often in partially submerged sea caves.

While all dragons keep hoards of treasure, the hoard of a bronze dragon more resembles a vast library-with the shelves kept carefully above the waterline, of course. In addition to their collections of esoteric lore, bronze dragons keep treasures associated with the sea, such as beautiful scrimshaw, flawless pearls, and equipment inlaid with mother-of-pearl and abalone shell.

Paragons of virtue, nobility, and grace, metallic dragons are benevolent entities revered as mythic beings akin to gods in both their power and majesty. Few have ever seen a metallic dragon firsthand, but tales of their intervention in mortals' lives-and of their passing-always spread far and wide. Named for the way their scales resemble the shining metals humanoids use in commerce, warfare, and industry, these immense beings are diverse in their interests and abilities, and they don't seem to mind being associated with such mundane materials. After all, to compare a gold dragon to a gold coin is like comparing an ocean to a glass of water-though they may seem similar at first glance, the raw power, breadth, and grandeur of one simply overwhelms the other.

In addition to metallic dragons and their chromatic counterparts, other types of dragons roam the world and the rest of the multiverse. In the legendary lands of Tian Xia on the other side of the globe are the imperial dragons, serpentine beings who protect the cosmic balance and defend their ancient homeland. Outside the Material Plane, primal dragons such as the domineering brine dragon and reclusive cloud dragon shape the nature and goings-on of the Elemental Planes. Countless other types of dragons are sure to exist, including dragons on far-flung planes of existence and, it is rumored, primeval dragons who soar between the stars.

wyBUi7dtwu1BxxLV.name: 操控水位(随意施法) Control Water (At Will)
wyBUi7dtwu1BxxLV.description:
通过将你的意志赋予水体，你可以抬升或者降低选择区域内的水位10尺。区域内具有水特征的生物承受 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{缓慢术 Slow}的效果。

区域 50尺长50尺宽

pkX4RMcX6QZp0wuV.name: 隐雾术(随意施法) Obscuring Mist (At Will)
pkX4RMcX6QZp0wuV.description: 你唤来一团迷雾。在雾中的所有生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，并且在雾外的所有生物对其内的生物获得隐蔽。你可以解消这团云雾。

u4K70JcBJiHmv4ei.name: 动物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Animals (Constant)
u4K70JcBJiHmv4ei.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

thy0OpcI6dFq3W3j.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

jcHkvPONg4SesmVb.name: Electricity Aura
jcHkvPONg4SesmVb.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15 feet} [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12 electricity damage}

The bronze dragon can turn this aura on or off using a single action, which has the concentrate trait, and it can choose to not affect allies with the aura.

t0slPYAl6mytNXG7.name: Vortex
t0slPYAl6mytNXG7.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]{40 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Water in the aura that is also in the same body of water as the dragon is difficult terrain for @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swimming} creatures that don't have the water trait.

hHrGBCeIy4565BFU.name: Vortex Pull
hHrGBCeIy4565BFU.description:
Trigger A creature in the dragon's vortex uses a Swim action.

Effect The dragon creates a current of water, forcing the triggering creature to attempt a Athletics check to Swim. If the creature fails, it's pulled 30 feet toward the dragon and the triggering action is lost. If it succeeds, it can Swim normally (using the result of that roll if it doesn't have a Swim speed).

pSJ8UuUcEbstSlWE.name: Breath Weapon
pSJ8UuUcEbstSlWE.description:
The bronze dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Lightning The dragon breathes lightning in a @Template[type:line|distance:100|traits:arcane,electricity,evocation,damaging-effect]{100-foot line} that deals [[/r {12d12}[electricity]]]{12d12 electricity damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save).
  • Repulsion Gas The dragon breathes a @Template[type:line|distance:100|traits:arcane,abjuration,incapacitation,mental]{100-foot line} of repulsive gas. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} from the dragon for 1 round (or 2 rounds on a critical failure).

jv3hOJvw3g4A5KWY.name: Draconic Frenzy
jv3hOJvw3g4A5KWY.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.

FDVxe2jOvdrTKmQY.name: Draconic Momentum
FDVxe2jOvdrTKmQY.description: When the dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges its Breath Weapon.

055jXlPNVGmKtAdN.name: Water Mastery
055jXlPNVGmKtAdN.description: For up to 120 minutes per day, the dragon, along with allied creatures and vessels within 50 feet, can move at double their normal Speed in water.

Manticore.name: 蝎尾狮 Manticore
Manticore.publicNotes:
The manticore is a monstrous amalgamation of lion, dragon, and human with a penchant for feasting on human flesh. Its distinctive tail is festooned with large quills like those of a porcupine, which the manticore flings at prey by whipping its tail like a sling. These deadly spikes give the manticore the power to slaughter even well-armed warriors from the safety of the sky.

Although the anthropomorphic face of the manticore suggests a keen intellect, most creatures of its kind are simple-minded killers. They can be clever liars, however, and their voices have a strangely musical sound that has lured many unwitting travelers into an ambush. A manticore discovered by uneducated humanoids can sometimes become the center of adoration and even worship; a manticore in this situation swiftly gives in to its laziness and allows its acolytes to bring it tribute in the form of food and treasure, feasting upon its own followers when offerings become scarce. Stronger humanoids who encounter a manticore can cow it through intimidation and violence, sometimes even forcing it into service as a mount. As long as the manticore is well fed with human flesh and its master leads it to victory, a manticore mount can prove surprisingly loyal.

hHLGOCYOj0KZUdYI.name: Spike Volley
hHLGOCYOj0KZUdYI.description:
The manticore flings up to two spikes from its tail, targeting either two different creatures or a single creature. If the manticore targets two different creatures, these creatures must be within 20 feet of one another, and the manticore makes a separate Strike against each; this counts as only one Strike for the manticore's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks. If the manticore fires both spikes at the same creature, it makes a single Strike. If the attack hits, it deals the damage of a single spike, but the target is pinned in place, rendering it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. A creature that succeeds at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:23|name:Remove Spike] check (attempted as a single action) can pull the spike free.

A manticore can hurl no more than 12 spikes in 24 hours.

Pit Fiend.name: 深狱炼魔 Pit Fiend
Pit Fiend.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Pit Fiend.publicNotes:
When an army of devils invades to bathe a region in bloodshed and hellfire, it is likely that one of Hell's most powerful and diabolical generals, the pit fiend, masterminded the incursion. Cunning, powerful, and ruthless, pit fiends often serve the archdevils directly. They rule infernal duchies, subjugate mortal worlds, and usurp infernal rivals using unparalleled despotism and calculated ferocity. To realize their tyrannical machinations, pit fiends claim mortal souls that they corrupt into lemure servants, which can then be shaped and transformed through infernal manipulation into the terrifying devils that form Hell's formidable legions. They often select the most wicked and vicious lemures for their armies, drawing upon these lesser devils' depravity during powerful magical ceremonies to create hideous and terrifying abominations that can cow and eviscerate the pit fiend's enemies.

Pit fiends themselves are crafted deep within the nightmarish bowels of Nessus, the ninth layer of Hell, to serve the whims of archdevils and infernal dukes. Those pit fiends that don't leave Nessus to command infernal legions in the upper layers of Hell often form the courts of Hell's elite, gathering cabals and sects that shape Hell's political landscape through subterfuge and manipulation. But many pit fiends see themselves as living embodiments of hellfire, the all-encompassing wrath of Hell, and thus prefer to dwell in realms consumed by fire. In Avernus, Dis, Malebolge, Nessus, and Phlegethon, pit fiends build vast citadels of brimstone wreathed in flame to lord over.

Pit fiends tower over other devils, standing at least 16 feet tall, weighing over 1,000 pounds, and brandishing wingspans in excess of 20 feet. Infernal Dukes Elite members of Hell's political infrastructure and leadership hierarchy, the dukes of Hell are chosen from among the most tyrannical, oppressive, and conniving devils. While not all infernal dukes are pit fiends, a pit fiend's natural disposition toward conquest and oppression often make it an ideal candidate for this position. To create an infernal duke, adjust the pit fiend to be between 21st and 25th level. Because of their physical prowess, manipulative nature, and powerful spellcasting abilities, infernal dukes make excellent villains for long-running campaigns.

Masters of corruption and architects of conquest, devils seek both to tempt mortal life to join in their pursuit of all things profane and to spread tyranny throughout all worlds. The temptations they offer mortals range from great powers granted by the signing of an infernal contract to twisted favors following a whispered pledge to a diabolic patron, or any number of even subtler exchanges. Those who succumb to these temptations find themselves consigned to an afterlife of endless torment in the pits of Hell, wherein the only hope of escape lies in the chance of being promoted to become a devil in the infernal ranks. Every devil has a specific role to play in the upkeep of the remorseless bureaucratic machine that is Hell, from soldiers and scholars to inquisitors, lawyers, judges, and executioners. Lowly lemures and imps perform subservient labor to more powerful and specialized devils, such as contract devils and erinyes, while the greatest pit fiends command entire infernal armies.

mRcunWMMtA2wBZ4C.name: 神迹术(每年一次) Miracle (Once per Year)
mRcunWMMtA2wBZ4C.description:
你从你的神术来源请求直接的帮助。你的神术来源总是会拒绝与其本性相悖的请求，并且可能满足一个另外的请求（可能更为强力或者更符合其本性），而不是你所本来请求的那个。一次施放神迹术可以达成下列事情。

  • 复制任何你有许可标准（Access）的9环级或者更低的神术法术。
  • 复制任何你有许可标准（Access）的7环级或者更低的非神术法术。
  • 产生任何效果与上述效果相当的效果。
  • 逆转提到的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish} 效果。

GM可能会允许你尝试使用 神迹术 Miracle 来产生比这些更强的效果，但是这可能非常危险，或者该法术可能只会部分生效。

eWfKYEEWPxEx5oaP.name: 缚魂术(随意施法) Bind Soul (At Will)
eWfKYEEWPxEx5oaP.description: 你扭曲目标的灵魂，并将其禁锢在黑蓝宝石中。当灵魂在宝石中时，灵魂无法通过任何方式复活，即使通过祈愿术（wish）也如此。如果该宝石被摧毁，或者宝石上的缚魂术被反制，灵魂会被解放。该宝石AC为16，硬度为10。一枚宝石无法容纳超过一个灵魂，并且任何尝试会浪费该法术。

cfR1BSTJeK8YSbvs.name: 神圣裁决(随意施法) Divine Decree (At Will)
cfR1BSTJeK8YSbvs.description:
你呢喃你信仰中的一段强大祷词，这是会伤害对立你的信念之人的敕令。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。你对区域内生物造成7d10伤害；每个生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。具有你所选择的阵营的生物不受法术影响。阵营既不对应也不对立的目标，将其豁免结果视为更好一级，并且不会承受伤害以外的额外效果。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1分钟。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} ，持续1分钟。在你的原属位面，一个在豁免中大失败生物生物会如同在 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{放逐术 Banishment} 豁免中失败一般被放逐。10级或者更低的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。在失败时，它会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} 1分钟；在大失败时，它会死亡。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，并且在豁免大失败时必须尝试第二次豁免的生物等级增加2。

Q1MuNYAdloug8lgC.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
Q1MuNYAdloug8lgC.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

pTkdWpwWTgPbS918.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
pTkdWpwWTgPbS918.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

abJ4KU3qfoXEExEU.name: 火墙术(随意施法) Wall of Fire (At Will)
abJ4KU3qfoXEExEU.description:
你创造一面火焰墙壁，它会灼烧穿过它的生物。你创造至多60尺长的10尺高5尺厚的直线型火焰墙壁，或者5尺厚，10尺半径10尺高环形火焰。该墙无论哪种形态均为竖直墙；如果你想的话，墙的高度可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。任何穿过该墙或者在回合开始时占据墙的区域的生物承受4d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d6。

eVPsvySsrEJWnpGV.name: 火球术(随意施法) Fireball (At Will)
eVPsvySsrEJWnpGV.description:
在你指定的位置爆发出咆哮的烈焰，造成6d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

VvjAbWhcvdKqnrml.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At Will)
VvjAbWhcvdKqnrml.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

KLX51VJomJOpNAgE.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

cjHi3qrYqK60e3Nn.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
cjHi3qrYqK60e3Nn.description:
The pit fiend can make an Attack of Opportunity when a creature within reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to the usual trigger. The devil can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and they disrupt actions on any hit, not only a critical hit.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

tKTCH6a5g78miSHu.name: Commander's Aura
tKTCH6a5g78miSHu.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Commanded or allied evil creatures in the aura of lower level than the pit fiend gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.5NSWRxAsJuvwyl0E]{Effect: Commander's Aura}

YpgcfJpD1jMhcu1X.name: Devil Shaping
YpgcfJpD1jMhcu1X.description:
The pit fiend reshapes a large number of @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.zJro50sLFmOcDLdO]{Lemures} within a 600-foot radius into more powerful devils to swell Hell's legions. The pit fiend must have available the number of lemures listed on the table below.

Devil Level Number of Lemures
4 or below 4
5-6 8
7-8 16
9-10 32
11-12 64
13-14 128
15-16 256
17-18 512
19-20 1.024

The pit fiend can shape 100 lemures per day, to a maximum of 1,100 lemures in 11 days. Devils created in this way are in thrall to the pit fiend and follow its orders, with the exception of created pit fiends or other devils of similar power, which are always independent. As a result, few pit fiends choose to create peers. At the end of the Devil Shaping activity, the pit fiend attempts an incredibly hard Religion check of the desired devil's level, with results as follows.

Critical Success The pit fiend shapes two devils from the massed lemures instead of one.

Success The pit fiend shapes a devil of the desired type and level.

Failure The devil shaped from the lemures is 2 levels lower than the intended devil.

Critical Failure The pit fiend fails to shape any devils and draws the ire of an archdevil for its waste of resources.

I2ll4xGsFEeBgdRL.name: Fast Swoop
I2ll4xGsFEeBgdRL.description: The pit fiend Flies and makes a wing Strike at any point during its movement.

5CiCYm71I6kB4UPC.name: Masterful Quickened Casting
5CiCYm71I6kB4UPC.description:
Frequency once per round.

Effect If the pit fiend's next action is to cast an 8th-level or lower innate spell, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

6THNxAaI4CZSj0oW.name: Pit Fiend Venom
6THNxAaI4CZSj0oW.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:43]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {7d6}[poison]]]{7d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 round)

Pixie.name: 皮克精 Pixie
Pixie.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Pixie.publicNotes:
Insatiably curious, overly excitable, and just a bit puckish, pixies are wanderers and tricksters who use their pixie dust to create all sorts of whimsical situations, as well as to defend themselves. Other creatures often have trouble understanding a pixie's rapid, rambling way of speaking.

Elusive, flighty, and ebullient, sprites are what many villagers first imagine when they hear the terms "fey" or "fairy." While their dispositions vary from the benevolent grig to the trickster pixie, all sprites share a connection to magic and diminutive size. This family of fey shares its name with its slightest and most populous member, the common sprite.

Po7qk3bmoY9QU4EJ.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
Po7qk3bmoY9QU4EJ.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

6D2LM8I9vaa7jOrL.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
6D2LM8I9vaa7jOrL.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

giE56Vm25ZKR3ZJm.name: Sprinkle Pixie Dust
giE56Vm25ZKR3ZJm.description:
The pixie sprinkles pixie dust onto one of its arrows. If the pixie hits a creature with that arrow before the pixie's next turn, the arrow inflicts one of the following special effects instead of dealing damage. Each effect depends on the target's Will save. On a critical hit, the target treats its save result as one degree worse.

  • Charm @Check[type:will|dc:21|traits:emotion,enchantment,incapacitation,mental] (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, mental) The target suffers the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} spell, except it doesn't gain a bonus to its save if the only hostile act was the pixie firing its bow, and the pixie can choose to direct the target's adoration toward another creature rather than itself.
  • Memory Loss @Check[type:will|dc:21|traits:divination,mental] (divination, mental) On a failed Will save, the target loses the last 5 minutes of its memory.
  • Sleep @Check[type:will|dc:21|traits:enchantment,incapacitation,mental,sleep] (enchantment, incapacitation, mental, sleep) The target suffers the effects of a 3rd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep} spell.
  • Subdual @Check[type:will|dc:21|basic:true|traits:enchantment,mental,nonlethal] (enchantment, mental, nonlethal) The target takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6 mental damage}, depending on its basic Will save.

Phoenix.name: 凤凰 Phoenix
Phoenix.hp: regeneration 20 (deactivated by cold or evil), self-resurrection
Phoenix.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Phoenix.publicNotes:
The phoenix is a primordial bird made of heat and flame that dwells in the most inhospitable regions of the desert. Though highly intelligent and brimming with compassion, the phoenix is best-known for its iconic ability to resurrect itself when slain, emerging reborn from the ashes of its own corpse. Phoenixes are often sought out for their knowledge or healing abilities, as they cannot abide the sight of suffering and deny their succor only to the most foul and irredeemable of creatures.

Phoenixes enjoy the company of metallic dragons, and when the two dwell in close proximity, they can forge lifelong friendships, sharing their resources and words of wisdom while keeping each other updated on regional news.

While most phoenixes are benevolent, they are not infallible. When a phoenix loses its way or falls under the influence of evil, it still retains its strong appetite for knowledge. Evil phoenixes are known to assault universities and libraries in their pursuit for power-not only to gain new information, but also to set fire to the texts and thus hoard that knowledge for themselves.

OImSgHtFF2C6yTuh.name: 不灭明焰(随意施法) Continual Flame (At Will)
OImSgHtFF2C6yTuh.description:
一团魔法的火焰从物体上喷出，如同火炬一般明亮。它不需要氧气，不会与水反应，也不发出热量。

升阶 (+1) 消耗按照后文增加：

  • 3环级16gp；
  • 4环级30gp；
  • 5环级60gp；
  • 6环级120gp；
  • 7环级270gp；
  • 8环级540gp；
  • 9环级1350gp；
  • 10环级3350gp。

Az2vK9ZawWFjYNTp.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At Will)
Az2vK9ZawWFjYNTp.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

QgUyKi2NczmiII2x.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
QgUyKi2NczmiII2x.description:
你能看见 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

y2DYzWNaDHJhFnqG.name: 侦测魔法(恒定法术) Detect Magic (Constant)
y2DYzWNaDHJhFnqG.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

qssb4IVNo6C2zIwe.name: Self-Resurrection
qssb4IVNo6C2zIwe.description: When a phoenix dies, it collapses into a pile of smoldering ashes before returning to life fully healed [[/br 1d4 #Self-Resurrection]]{1d4 rounds} later, as if subject to a 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual. Self-resurrection happens only if there are some remains to resurrect; for instance, a phoenix killed by a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} spell can't use this ability. A phoenix whose remains rest within an area devoted to an evil deity by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dbd5W6G8U2vzWolN]{Consecrate} can't self-resurrect until its remains are no longer in that area. A phoenix can self-resurrect only once per year.

reoPbPNpXyLy56Ny.name: Shroud of Flame
reoPbPNpXyLy56Ny.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

[[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage} @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save

While this aura is active, any adjacent creature that hits the phoenix with a melee attack or otherwise touches it takes [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage}. The phoenix can activate or deactivate the aura with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

eBfnitbq2Wb56ZRG.name: Flaming Strafe
eBfnitbq2Wb56ZRG.description: The phoenix blazes with superheated flame and Flies up to its Speed. It deals [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} to each creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} of each square it moves through (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save).

Stone Mauler.name: 石拳手 Stone Mauler
Stone Mauler.publicNotes:
These towering heaps of earth can inflict tremendous damage up close and from afar.

Earth elementals make excellent bodyguards for adventuresome spelunkers and are ideal protectors of important subterranean locations such as vaults and treasuries.

mrrLoMpl5WnNGk4e.name: Earthbound
mrrLoMpl5WnNGk4e.description: When not touching solid ground, a stone mauler is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

BER1sjugNCn7ml14.name: Crumble
BER1sjugNCn7ml14.description:
Trigger The stone mauler takes damage from a hostile source while atop rock or earth.

Effect The stone mauler crumbles into the ground, Burrowing down 15 feet. This Burrowing does not trigger reactions.

The stone mauler can't Crumble again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Crumble]]{1d4 rounds}.

cKztX9AO2dzSFhZu.name: Spike Stones
cKztX9AO2dzSFhZu.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Spikes of rock rise up from all stone surfaces in the emanation, creating difficult terrain. A creature moving in the terrain takes [[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6 piercing damage} for each square of spikes it moves into (a Large or larger creature takes damage only once for each square it moves, even if its space covers multiple squares of spikes). Creatures with the earth trait ignore all effects within the area.

The stone mauler can disable or activate spike stones as a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

eNTumcCOMnTdNzht.name: Earth Glide
eNTumcCOMnTdNzht.description: The stone mauler can Burrow through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the stone mauler moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Storm Giant.name: 风暴巨人 Storm Giant
Storm Giant.publicNotes:
Storm giants are looming but benevolent stewards of sea and sky, often serving as the natural guardians of tropical islands, coastlines, or rocky archipelagos. Storm giants tend to rapidly shift in mood and behavior, one moment engaging in peaceful negotiation, the next unleashing unbridled ferocity against their foes. In this way, they embody both the fury of a raging tempest and the calm of a hurricane's eye. This can make them valuable allies who race to the aid of those in need, but their allies remain must be alert and mindful of their mood, as the giants can be quick to anger or aggressive when caution is most appropriate.

Most storm giants have complexions akin to the crystal blue of the ocean or the warm violet of a sky touched by the setting sun. Their hair tends to be dark purple, blue, or black, and their eyes often have a silvery sheen. A typical storm giant stands 21 feet tall, weighs 12,000 pounds, and lives to be about 600 years old.

Giants are massive humanoid creatures who live in remote regions throughout the world. They are divided into a number of subtypes.

ZnTTiuOGrLAY6c9F.name: 操控天气(随意施法) Control Weather (At Will)
ZnTTiuOGrLAY6c9F.description:
你改变了天气，让它变得平静并更符合当前季节，或者根据季节来选择两种效果。

你无法细致地控制这些气象，比如龙卷风的确切行进路线或者雷电落在哪里。

  • 秋季 Autumn 凉爽（cold weather），雾（fog），炎热（mild heat），霰（sleet）
  • 春季 Spring 细雨（drizzle），高温（heat），飓风（hurricane），霰（sleet），雷暴雨（thunderstorm），龙卷风（tornado）
  • 夏季 Summer 细雨（drizzle），大雨（downpour），炽热（extreme heat），冰雹（hail），高温（heat）
  • 冬季 Winter 暴风雪（blizzard），寒（mild cold），极寒（extreme cold），融雪（thaw）

大成功 你能够根据需要改变天气，并且能够影响更远的区域（至多半径5英里的圆形区域）、或者让仪式持续时间更长（任意数量个额外d12小时，至多为16d12）。

成功 你能够根据需要改变天气。

失败 你没能根据需要改变天气。

大失败 天气以一种意想不到的方式产生了变化，变化方式由GM决定，不过通常会与你的真实愿望相悖（比如当你想要好天气的时候，会出现极强的风暴）。

升阶 (9环级) 你能够制造出不合时节的天气以及矛盾的气候效果，比如极端寒冷和飓风。你能够把气候变为对于其他季节来说平静且正常的样子，或者从任意季节列表中选取天气效果。

ZjPs2BJXU8fI4dyP.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
ZjPs2BJXU8fI4dyP.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

VwVV639b1fqL180o.name: 浮空术(随意施法) Levitate (At Will)
VwVV639b1fqL180o.description:
你移去重力，令目标漂浮距离地面5尺。在法术持续时间中，你可以通过一个单动作移动目标上或者下移10尺，这具有专注特征。因浮空术而漂浮的生物在攻击骰上承受-2环境减值。漂浮的生物可以花费一个交互（Interact）动作来稳定自身，并在其回合剩余时间里取消该减值。如果目标邻接一个固定的物体，或者足够稳定的地形，他可以通过攀爬（如果平面是垂直的，例如一堵墙）或者匍匐（如果平面是水平的，例如天花板）沿着该平面移动。GM决定具体什么表面可以攀爬，什么表面应当匍匐。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{法术效果：浮空术}

OvsLPiSD2whyqgU0.name: Lightning Blade
OvsLPiSD2whyqgU0.description:
The storm giant raises one hand to the sky, channeling a bolt of lightning into the blade held in the other. The giant makes a greatsword Strike with a -2 circumstance penalty against each creature within its reach.

It makes only one attack roll and compares the result against each creature's AC. This Strike deals an additional [[/r {3d12}[electricity]]]{3d12 electricity damage} and counts as two attacks for the giant's multiple attack penalty.

casqOYm41JuCEUGY.name: Wide Swing
casqOYm41JuCEUGY.description: The storm giant makes a single greatsword Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the giant's multiple attack penalty.

Succubus.name: 魅魔 Succubus
Succubus.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Succubus.languages: Three Additional Mortal Languages, Telepathy 100 feet, Tongues
Succubus.publicNotes:
Succubi are manifestations of the sin of destructive lust, and they are the most attractive of all demons-as befits their role in seducing mortals to fall to sin. The concept of gender is fluid to a succubus, as they can adopt countless humanoid forms of any gender to aid in their goals. Most succubi have a feminine true form (incubi, which usually have a masculine true form, are a different kind of demon), but regardless of gender, a lust demon is supernaturally beautiful or handsome, but with curving horns, bat wings, sharp claws, and a sinuous tail.

When disguised as a mortal humanoid on the Material Plane, a succubus whispers into the ears of mortals, urging them to pursue their darkest and most destructive desires and pushing them into depravity, using magic only if persuasion fails. While mortals often fixate on succubi's application of sexual lust, these demons are can easily exploit lust for power, knowledge, fame, or any other desire as easily as more carnal appetites. Their ability to infiltrate societies makes them excellent spies, assassins, and political saboteurs as well. Ultimately, the succubus enjoys all means of upending mortal culture.

When a sinful mortal soul is judged and sent on to the Abyss, it can become a deadly fiend-a demon. Demons are living incarnations of sin-be they classic sins like wrath or gluttony, or more "specialized" depravities like an obsession with torture or the act of treason or treachery. Once formed, a demon's driving goals are twofold-the amassing of personal power, and the corruption of mortal souls to cause them to become tainted by sin. In this way demons ensure a never-ending supply of new demons to bolster their ever-growing ranks in the Abyss.

w1NzMkjL2WpASvwU.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
w1NzMkjL2WpASvwU.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

QxoUvPwEhbtilrhX.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
QxoUvPwEhbtilrhX.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

QRnahY34q6Ut5lgn.name: 暗示术(随意施法) Suggestion (At Will)
QRnahY34q6Ut5lgn.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

dTQnIqFEKQGXaABe.name: 读心术(随意施法) Mind Reading (At Will)
dTQnIqFEKQGXaABe.description:
你通过一次短暂的心灵接触来尝试阅读目标的想法。它必须尝试一次意志豁免。目标会暂时免疫你的读心术1小时。

大成功 目标得知当施放该法术时你模糊的表层想法。

成功 你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

失败 你得知当施放该法术时目标模糊的表层想法，并且你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

大失败 如失败，并且在法术持续时间中，你可以维持该法术来再次侦测目标的表层想法。目标不会获得另外的豁免。

BpmOhvvFOeWcwME5.name: 魅惑术(随意施法) Charm (At Will)
BpmOhvvFOeWcwME5.description:
在目标看来，你的言语甜蜜动听，你的形象笼罩在梦幻般的光晕中。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免，如果你或者你的盟友最近威胁它或者对它进行了敌对行为，会获得+4环境加值。

你可以解消该法术。如果你对目标使用任何敌对动作，法术终止。当该法术结束时，目标不一定会意识到自己被魅惑了，除非它和你的友好关系，或者你说服它去做的事情与其期望发生冲突。这也即是说你可以通过常规的方法说服目标继续作为你的朋友。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且意识到你尝试魅惑它。

成功 该目标不受影响，但是认为你的法术是某种无害的东西，而不是魅惑术，除非它能识别该法术（通常通过辨识法术（Identifying Spells））。

失败 目标对你的态度变为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{友好 Friendly}）。如果已经是友好，则变为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{乐于帮助 Helpful}。它不能对你做出敌对行为。

大失败 目标变为乐于帮助（helpful）并且不能对你做出敌对行为。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备。

升阶 (8环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备，并且你能以至多10个生物作为目标。

UaoMjikl5YrplwCF.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法) Detect Alignment (At Will)
UaoMjikl5YrplwCF.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

dK5Meg25B2t4B34g.name: Rejection Vulnerability
dK5Meg25B2t4B34g.description: As succubi are beings of pure lust, creatures that reject their lust can metaphysically harm them. When a succubus fails a Diplomacy check to Embrace or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request}, or when a creature succeeds at its save against a succubus's mental spell or ability, the succubus takes [[/r {2d6}[mental]]]{2d6 mental damage}. For one hour after causing mental damage to a succubus in this way, a creature can deal [[/r {2d6}[mental]]]{2d6 mental damage} to the succubus with a successful @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.nEwqNNWX6scLt4sc]{Demoralize} incorporating its rejection.

b3OSC1hy3efFqhm7.name: Seductive Presence
b3OSC1hy3efFqhm7.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any creature in the aura that could be sexually attracted to a succubus takes a -2 circumstance penalty to checks and DCs to oppose the succubus's mental spells, Deception, and Diplomacy.

ghngQIhTKh6viVvP.name: Change Shape
ghngQIhTKh6viVvP.description:
The succubus can take on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

vkMvsL1nrlHkiJQQ.name: Embrace
vkMvsL1nrlHkiJQQ.description: The succubus attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature using their Diplomacy bonus instead of Athletics. If the creature is willing, the succubus grapples it automatically.

NFPV2IK6zYWCTJbC.name: Passionate Kiss
NFPV2IK6zYWCTJbC.description:
Frequency Once per round.

Effect The succubus engages a creature they have @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} in an embrace or other act of passion to drain its vital essence. The kiss makes the creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} or increases its drained condition by 1, to a maximum of 4. The creature takes [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 negative damage} and the succubus regains Hit Points equal to the damage dealt. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or be affected by a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion} to submit to more actions of passion rather than trying to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

vgbSuZiK389nv7Tm.name: Profane Gift
vgbSuZiK389nv7Tm.description:
Frequency once per day.

Effect The succubus on can give a willing humanoid a profane gift. That creature gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws. As long as the gift persists, the succubus can communicate telepathically with the target at any distance, see through the creature's senses, and target the creature with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion} through the telepathic link. In addition, the creature uses an outcome one degree of success worse than it rolls on saving throws against the lust demon's suggestion.

A humanoid can't have more than one profane gift at a time, and a succubus can't grant more than one profane gift at a time. Removing the gift requires an @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual. The succubus can remove the gift as a free action to give the recipient a permanent @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} condition. A 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} spell is required to reduce this stupefied condition by 1. A summoned succubus can't grant a profane gift.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.g5Yen1FhEMCzCJkv]{Effect: Profane Gift}

Viper.name: 蝰蛇 Viper
Viper.publicNotes:
Each member of this family of venomous snakes has long, hinged fangs that inject potent venom in their prey. Different vipers inject different types of venom, which might result in paralysis, extreme pain and swelling, blood clotting, or even the sudden stopping of the victim's heart.

Snakes come in an array of forms, from jungle-dwelling constrictors that wrap around their prey to venomous vipers with deadly bites. Regardless, all snakes consume their prey whole by unhinging their jaws and using powerful muscles to move the food down their throats and into their stomachs.

YIHoSZN2nTp139Dg.name: Slink
YIHoSZN2nTp139Dg.description:
Trigger A creature ends its movement adjacent to the viper or within the viper's space.

Effect The viper Strides, Climbs, or Swims up to 10 feet (or up to the relevant Speed, if that Speed is less than 10 feet). It must end its movement in a location that isn't within 5 feet of a foe. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Stone Golem.name: 石魔像 Stone Golem
Stone Golem.publicNotes:
石魔像是缓慢而坚固的构装体，通常由大理石或花岗岩雕刻而成。它们通常在静止时被当做艺术品，因此一些石魔像的制造者会雇佣雕刻大师来确保将这些构装体造成美丽的雕塑。较古老的石魔像可能会风化，表面有磨损或裂纹，或者断鼻断指，但这种风化并不会影响石像的功能。

传说表明巨大的石魔像存在于某些古代遗迹中。这些巨大的石魔像比一般石魔像要强大的得多。它们至少有15级，体型不会少于超大型——大多数甚至为巨型。因为它们的体型如此之大，而它们所居住的建筑是如此破败，以至于这样的石魔像觉醒会导致周围建筑倒塌、古老的地基塌陷、天花板落下砸向敌人。除了这里列出的数据之外，这些巨大的石魔像攻击范围更广，一记横扫就可以同时击倒多个目标。

传说中的魔像由基本材料精心制做，然后被魔法活化成为强大的守护者。它会完全服从于创造者的命令，哪怕在其创造者去世后的数年乃至几个世纪的岁月中都是如此。目前已知有两种可以制造魔像的方法。传统的方法为对新制造的魔像注入被收割的灵魂或精华，这种方式被认为是对那些认为灵魂神圣不可侵犯之人的侮辱，那些邪恶或无道德观念的魔像制造者会倾向于使用这样的方法。另一种不那么臭名昭著的方法是将纯净的正能量引入魔像体内，人为地模拟灵魂的创造的过程。这并不能给与魔像真正的灵魂，而且这个方法通常更加昂贵且耗时。不管使用何种方法，最终得到的魔像在功能上是一样的。每种魔像都有独特的生命力量，能让它们受到某些形式的魔法影响，但是除了这些弱点之外，它们通常对魔法免疫，也很难被武器伤害。

在游戏中，魔像更适合作为需要征服的敌人，而不是作为伴随玩家角色冒险的盟友。制造魔像的过程是耗时、昂贵且困难，只有极具天赋的施法者或工匠才有可能完成这种任务。虽然某些魔法典籍，例如所谓的“魔像手册”——据说可以为魔像制造者提供帮助，但大多数情况下制造魔像这样的事情应该有GM来完成。

魔像的部件可以作为战利品或魔法物品回收，具体取决于不同的魔像。边栏列举了每种魔像可以被回收的部件的示例。

eYD6EiiIYvny4Vq2.name: 魔像抗魔 Golem Antimagic
eYD6EiiIYvny4Vq2.description:
被伤害：寒冷和水([[/r {5d10}]]{5d10伤害}, 区域效果或可持续伤害则为[[/r {2d8}]]{2d8伤害}；被治疗：酸液(区域效果[[/r {2d8}[healing]]]{2d8点生命值})；被减速：土

魔像免疫法术和魔法能力，魔像自身所拥有的除外。但是每种魔像都会被少数几个特定法术以特殊方式影响。这些效果在魔像的具体数据里会以缩写的方式给出，这里则是详细解释。如果列出的条目包含多种类型（例如“寒冷和水”）则这些类型的法术都能对魔像产生影响。

  • 被伤害 Harmed By 任意该种类的魔法以该魔像为目标时，都能对该魔像造成所列伤害（该伤害无伤害类型），并取代原本的法术效果。如果魔像开始回合时位于该种类型的范围魔法效果中，或受到该种魔法的持续性效果影响，则受到括号内所标明的伤害值。
  • 被治疗 Healed By 任意该种类的魔法以该魔像为目标时，都能解除该魔像的缓慢效果并治疗魔像相当于法术伤害一半的HP。如果魔像开始回合时位于该种类型的范围魔法效果中，则获得括号内所列的生命值。
  • 被减速 Slowed By 任意该种类的魔法以该魔像为目标时，都能让魔像陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续[[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮}，并取代原本的法术效果。如果魔像开始回合时位于该种类型的范围魔法效果中，则魔像在该轮中陷入缓慢1。
  • 法术弱点 Vulnerable To 每种魔像都会有针对某一种或几种特定的法术的弱点，具体效果会描述在数据中。

Jg5WkDHWpi1JRQ9k.name: 法术弱点：解除石化 Vulnerable to Stone to Flesh
Jg5WkDHWpi1JRQ9k.description: 对石魔像施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Pr1ruNTbzGn3H9w5]{解除石化 Stone to Flesh}法术能使魔像抗魔和物理抗力无效化，持续1轮。@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone}能立即逆转此效果。

RlajqjwuSiKB8NGC.name: 附加麻痹 Impose Paralysis
RlajqjwuSiKB8NGC.description:
触发 石魔像击中一个陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}的生物。

效果 该生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]豁免，否则@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。

bKmTRJI4PjS70sWZ.name: 势不可挡 Inexorable March
bKmTRJI4PjS70sWZ.description:
石魔像以满速度行走，推开路径空间上的所有生物。如果他们试图阻止魔像，就会受到伤害。

一个生物可以尝试通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|traits:damaging-effect]检定来阻挡其前进。如果豁免大成功，则阻挡的生物不受伤害；在其他情况下该生物受到石魔像的拳击伤害。

11mRPoFSEt1nYAnE.name: 减速脉冲 Slowing Pulse
11mRPoFSEt1nYAnE.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺弥漫}范围内的每个生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]检定，否则陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1分钟。

魔像在[[/br 1d4 #Slowing Pulse Recharge]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用减速脉冲。

Young Silver Dragon.name: 青年银龙 Young Silver Dragon
Young Silver Dragon.publicNotes:
Silver dragons are among the most chivalrous of all dragonkind; they wield frost and cold as weapons, can walk on clouds, and dwell high upon snowy mountain peaks or deep in steep, misty valleys. Although they typically make their lairs among the highlands, the pursuit of justice leads silver dragons to travel far and wide-often into the very heart of realms overrun by evil. These exemplars of righteousness are ceaseless in their determination to help the weak, spread honor, and stamp out evil.

Silver dragons are sleek and sinuous. Their hides resemble nothing so much as a suit of gleaming armor, lending further credence to the popular myth that silver dragons are the paladins of dragonkind. The zeal with which they seek out, confront, and defeat evil is unsurpassed even among their metallic cousins, and they adhere to strict codes of honor usually passed down from parent to hatchling. On occasion, they instead learn these codes from trusted mentors, usually other silver dragons or gold dragons. As they age, they become even more dedicated to their codes, often adding new and even more restrictive clauses to the systems that guide their behavior.

Silver dragons are incredibly altruistic and regularly consort with the citizens of goodly societies, of which they consider themselves protectors and guides. In addition to responding to evil threats, silver dragons work to prevent evil from taking root in the first place, and they ensure mortals under their care are well fed, educated, and treated with dignity. Although silver dragons can seem overzealous or even eager to join the fight against evil, they know that the best way to rid the world of corruption is to stamp out strife and disillusionment at their source, not to passively sit back and watch it grow into an unsolvable problem. Silver dragons can be vindictive, but they can also be forgiving; for evildoers who seek to atone for their sins and turn over a new leaf, the support of a silver dragon is both unwavering and invaluable.

Many silver dragons are also drawn to religious endeavors, venerating deities such as Iomedae, Sarenrae, and other deities concerned with justice, virtue, and redemption.

Paragons of virtue, nobility, and grace, metallic dragons are benevolent entities revered as mythic beings akin to gods in both their power and majesty. Few have ever seen a metallic dragon firsthand, but tales of their intervention in mortals' lives-and of their passing-always spread far and wide. Named for the way their scales resemble the shining metals humanoids use in commerce, warfare, and industry, these immense beings are diverse in their interests and abilities, and they don't seem to mind being associated with such mundane materials. After all, to compare a gold dragon to a gold coin is like comparing an ocean to a glass of water-though they may seem similar at first glance, the raw power, breadth, and grandeur of one simply overwhelms the other.

In addition to metallic dragons and their chromatic counterparts, other types of dragons roam the world and the rest of the multiverse. In the legendary lands of Tian Xia on the other side of the globe are the imperial dragons, serpentine beings who protect the cosmic balance and defend their ancient homeland. Outside the Material Plane, primal dragons such as the domineering brine dragon and reclusive cloud dragon shape the nature and goings-on of the Elemental Planes. Countless other types of dragons are sure to exist, including dragons on far-flung planes of existence and, it is rumored, primeval dragons who soar between the stars.

s1EiBDZD5WaFxheZ.name: 侦测阵营(仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (Evil Only)
s1EiBDZD5WaFxheZ.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

WW8hndG3qvu25VrH.name: Cloud Walk
WW8hndG3qvu25VrH.description: The silver dragon can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground.

NCdnViWXztATwZA5.name: Fog Vision
NCdnViWXztATwZA5.description: The silver dragon ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from fog and clouds.

R9oCMdMtlo1aed3A.name: Wing Deflection
R9oCMdMtlo1aed3A.description:
Trigger The silver dragon is targeted with an attack

Effect The dragon raises its wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the dragon is flying, it descends 10 feet after the attack is complete.

HrzOkjm7joQRK88q.name: Breath Weapon
HrzOkjm7joQRK88q.description:
The silver dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Frost The dragon breathes a cloud of frost in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:arcane,cold,evocation,damaging-effect] that deals [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 cold damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).
  • Paralyzing Gas The dragon breathes a blast of paralyzing gas. Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:arcane,enchantment,incapacitation] must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round on a critical failure).

NpgXzERVlP06NMCx.name: Draconic Frenzy
NpgXzERVlP06NMCx.description: The silver dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.

zeopy130t1G5DRUp.name: Draconic Momentum
zeopy130t1G5DRUp.description: When the silver dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges its Breath Weapon.

Young White Dragon.name: 青年白龙 Young White Dragon
Young White Dragon.publicNotes:
The most feral and least intelligent of all the chromatic dragons, white dragons are brutish, predatory, and chiefly motivated by self-preservation. Nearly all other dragons look down on white dragons as hopelessly hotheaded and dull, though this does not make them any less dangerous-in fact, it may mean the opposite. It's nearly impossible to treat with white dragons, not because they lack the capacity to do so, but because they just don't care to. They are as difficult to deal with as they are quick to anger, and they become incensed at almost anything. When a white dragon does speak, it spews threats, inane jokes, and incoherent babbling as a prelude to attacking-and when the attack comes, it's bloody and relentless.

Thankfully, white dragons prefer very cold, remote locations that are far from people. Dwelling on glacial mountaintops or in ice caverns beneath forbidding tundra, they treat the lands around them as their own personal hunting grounds. They fly out to feed or terrorize other creatures, especially those who trespass near the dragon's territory, then bring any treasure back to be displayed in icy niches in their lairs. They collect all kinds of valuables, with a slight preference for items with high utility-such as tools, trade goods, and fine food-over coins or jewels. The ability to shape ice lets white dragons rearrange their lairs exactly to their specifications, and they take great pride in how they've decorated their homes over the years.

While there are many types of dragons, from the powerful planar dragons to the strange esoteric dragons, few dragon varieties are as well-known and as rightly feared as the chromatic dragons. Differentiated by the hue of their scales, each color of dragon unleashes its own flavor of murderous cruelty-be it by claw, tooth, or breath-and unlike most creatures, dragons only become more powerful as they age. Their lust for treasure, food, bloodshed, and control are legendary. Physically powerful with egos to match, these dragons are often morally depraved and act as criminal masterminds, vicious tyrants, or voracious raiders.

umShxoDTXECH3WCs.name: Snow Vision
umShxoDTXECH3WCs.description: Snow doesn't impair a white dragon's vision; it ignores concealment from snowfall.

k72C42LOvjUNSP6f.name: Freezing Blood
k72C42LOvjUNSP6f.description:
Trigger An adjacent creature deals piercing or slashing damage to the dragon.

Effect The dragon's blood sprays on the creature, dealing [[/r {1d6}[cold]]]{1d6 cold damage}. A creature that takes cold damage in this way is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

7CwkOMYGSOhef0ns.name: Breath Weapon
7CwkOMYGSOhef0ns.description:
The dragon breathes a cloud of frost that deals [[/r {7d6}[cold]]]{7d6 cold damage} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]{30-foot cone} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

LPgRXjxPg5sOcWEv.name: Draconic Frenzy
LPgRXjxPg5sOcWEv.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.

QbCC0DUye0oVFVc4.name: Draconic Momentum
QbCC0DUye0oVFVc4.description: When the dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges its Breath Weapon.

SFJ6XAQzgQGC5zVV.name: Ground Slam
SFJ6XAQzgQGC5zVV.description:
The dragon slams into the ground. It can do this if it's on the ground or Flying within 10 feet of the ground. Each creature on the ground within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24|traits:damaging-effect] save or fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and take [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage}.

The dragon can then Step.

1yMkzmd8oyagICBZ.name: Ice Climb
1yMkzmd8oyagICBZ.description: A white dragon can climb on ice as though it had the listed climb Speed. It ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and doesn't risk falling when crossing ice.

BF9LWkoQrDrBUzhl.name: Shape Ice
BF9LWkoQrDrBUzhl.description:
The dragon reshapes a cube of ice or snow it touches, up to 10 feet across. Any creature standing atop the ice must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save or @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:15] check.

On a failure, the creature falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} atop the ice; on a critical failure, it falls off the ice entirely and is also prone.

Young Silver Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年银龙施法者 Young Silver Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Silver Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
Silver dragons are among the most chivalrous of all dragonkind; they wield frost and cold as weapons, can walk on clouds, and dwell high upon snowy mountain peaks or deep in steep, misty valleys. Although they typically make their lairs among the highlands, the pursuit of justice leads silver dragons to travel far and wide-often into the very heart of realms overrun by evil. These exemplars of righteousness are ceaseless in their determination to help the weak, spread honor, and stamp out evil.

Silver dragons are sleek and sinuous. Their hides resemble nothing so much as a suit of gleaming armor, lending further credence to the popular myth that silver dragons are the paladins of dragonkind. The zeal with which they seek out, confront, and defeat evil is unsurpassed even among their metallic cousins, and they adhere to strict codes of honor usually passed down from parent to hatchling. On occasion, they instead learn these codes from trusted mentors, usually other silver dragons or gold dragons. As they age, they become even more dedicated to their codes, often adding new and even more restrictive clauses to the systems that guide their behavior.

Silver dragons are incredibly altruistic and regularly consort with the citizens of goodly societies, of which they consider themselves protectors and guides. In addition to responding to evil threats, silver dragons work to prevent evil from taking root in the first place, and they ensure mortals under their care are well fed, educated, and treated with dignity. Although silver dragons can seem overzealous or even eager to join the fight against evil, they know that the best way to rid the world of corruption is to stamp out strife and disillusionment at their source, not to passively sit back and watch it grow into an unsolvable problem. Silver dragons can be vindictive, but they can also be forgiving; for evildoers who seek to atone for their sins and turn over a new leaf, the support of a silver dragon is both unwavering and invaluable.

Many silver dragons are also drawn to religious endeavors, venerating deities such as Iomedae, Sarenrae, and other deities concerned with justice, virtue, and redemption.

Paragons of virtue, nobility, and grace, metallic dragons are benevolent entities revered as mythic beings akin to gods in both their power and majesty. Few have ever seen a metallic dragon firsthand, but tales of their intervention in mortals' lives-and of their passing-always spread far and wide. Named for the way their scales resemble the shining metals humanoids use in commerce, warfare, and industry, these immense beings are diverse in their interests and abilities, and they don't seem to mind being associated with such mundane materials. After all, to compare a gold dragon to a gold coin is like comparing an ocean to a glass of water-though they may seem similar at first glance, the raw power, breadth, and grandeur of one simply overwhelms the other.

In addition to metallic dragons and their chromatic counterparts, other types of dragons roam the world and the rest of the multiverse. In the legendary lands of Tian Xia on the other side of the globe are the imperial dragons, serpentine beings who protect the cosmic balance and defend their ancient homeland. Outside the Material Plane, primal dragons such as the domineering brine dragon and reclusive cloud dragon shape the nature and goings-on of the Elemental Planes. Countless other types of dragons are sure to exist, including dragons on far-flung planes of existence and, it is rumored, primeval dragons who soar between the stars.

xvma62inLchiutva.name: 卜筮术 Augury
xvma62inLchiutva.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

s1EiBDZD5WaFxheZ.name: 侦测阵营(仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (Evil Only)
s1EiBDZD5WaFxheZ.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

lzL7WuFdsdDkdTC2.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
lzL7WuFdsdDkdTC2.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

WW8hndG3qvu25VrH.name: Cloud Walk
WW8hndG3qvu25VrH.description: The silver dragon can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground.

NCdnViWXztATwZA5.name: Fog Vision
NCdnViWXztATwZA5.description: The silver dragon ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from fog and clouds.

R9oCMdMtlo1aed3A.name: Wing Deflection
R9oCMdMtlo1aed3A.description:
Trigger The silver dragon is targeted with an attack

Effect The dragon raises its wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the dragon is flying, it descends 10 feet after the attack is complete.

HrzOkjm7joQRK88q.name: Breath Weapon
HrzOkjm7joQRK88q.description:
The silver dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Frost The dragon breathes a cloud of frost in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:arcane,cold,evocation,damaging-effect] that deals [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 cold damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).
  • Paralyzing Gas The dragon breathes a blast of paralyzing gas. Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:arcane,enchantment,incapacitation] must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round on a critical failure).

Young Green Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年绿龙施法者 Young Green Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Green Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
Green dragons are the most contemplative of the chromatic dragons as well as the most approachable. The key to understanding green dragons is to understand their obsession with knowledge and self-discipline. Any careful approach that takes advantage of a green dragon's fixations may end in a diplomatic outcome, but any misstep or slight can provoke a savage attack. Like most chromatic dragons, green dragons do not suffer fools-and the threshold for what they consider foolish is very low.

Though more open than their chromatic cousins to dealing with other creatures and dragons, green dragons prefer an isolated and quiet life. They tend to lair in the most forbidding parts of a forest, surrounded by tangled thickets, or else at the heart of some dismal gulch. If the terrain is suitable, some green dragons make their home in natural caves, which they expand to suit their needs.

Green dragons' pride leads them to see to the preservation of their forest homes. They feel that a verdant and lush forest is something that they alone have cultivated. This leads some green dragons to follow the path of druidism, though most prefer to study the arcane arts and occult lore. Most of them delve deeply into one particular field of study, and correspond with other scholars in the field by adopting a pen name that hides their true nature. Regardless of their chosen focus, green dragons seek to improve themselves, and their desire for knowledge makes them more likely to deal diplomatically with other creatures in order to obtain new information.

Their hoards are typically well kept, organized, and filled with tomes of lore and scrolls of magic along with antiquities they collect for their own inscrutable reasons. Many of these treasures come from across the globe, and many an adventurer has survived an encounter with a green dragon by stroking its ego and plying it with rare artifacts or lost lore from ancient cultures.

While there are many types of dragons, from the powerful planar dragons to the strange esoteric dragons, few dragon varieties are as well-known and as rightly feared as the chromatic dragons.
