Ancient Red Dragon.name: 古红龙 Ancient Red Dragon
Ancient Red Dragon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Ancient Red Dragon.publicNotes:
The largest and most powerful of the chromatic dragons, red dragons are a menace to civilizations everywhere, and their strength is rivaled only by their arrogance. Red dragons see themselves as regents and overlords of all dragonkind. With their crowns of crimson spikes and their command of blistering frame, this is no haughty boast in their eyes-only unquestioned fact.

Red dragons don't deign to speak with lesser creatures; they simply dominate and burn, enslaving weaker creatures to act as servants and to look after their lairs while the dragons slumber away. They take pleasure in dominating these creatures, and they demand tribute from their supplicants. Those who anger or disappoint end up eaten or reduced to ash. They command their enslaved minions to constantly build onto their lairs, carving out new tunnels and designing cunning traps that ensure the dragon's security.

Driven by their arrogance, red dragons are the most likely of the chromatic dragons to ravage settlements. They want the world to see them in their rightful place as powerful tyrants, and they delight in threatening all other creatures. They have no qualms about bullying, manipulating, or killing to complete their goals-or simply intimidating others through a public display of brutality and dominance.

As legendary as the brutishness of red dragons is the magnificence of their hoards of gold. Their lairs are often situated in dangerous places, with volcanoes being a favorite spot, as they find them foreboding and the constant warmth is comfortable. No matter the locale, red dragons sleep on a litter of coins and other treasures, which they zealously guard. Sometimes, the dragon's internal heat causes these precious metals to fuse together.

While there are many types of dragons, from the powerful planar dragons to the strange esoteric dragons, few dragon varieties are as well-known and as rightly feared as the chromatic dragons. Differentiated by the hue of their scales, each color of dragon unleashes its own flavor of murderous cruelty-be it by claw, tooth, or breath-and unlike most creatures, dragons only become more powerful as they age. Their lust for treasure, food, bloodshed, and control are legendary. Physically powerful with egos to match, these dragons are often morally depraved and act as criminal masterminds, vicious tyrants, or voracious raiders.

y3WGfwZSPUcdAfcZ.name: 暗示术(随意施法) Suggestion (At Will)
y3WGfwZSPUcdAfcZ.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

rrgWq5ZjlViY9gU0.name: 火墙术(随意施法) Wall of Fire (At Will)
rrgWq5ZjlViY9gU0.description:
你创造一面火焰墙壁，它会灼烧穿过它的生物。你创造至多60尺长的10尺高5尺厚的直线型火焰墙壁，或者5尺厚，10尺半径10尺高环形火焰。该墙无论哪种形态均为竖直墙；如果你想的话，墙的高度可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。任何穿过该墙或者在回合开始时占据墙的区域的生物承受4d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d6。

LOK7NfaxSYvS9eyQ.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
LOK7NfaxSYvS9eyQ.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

LfhW8MrjdGdRlQSS.name: Smoke Vision
LfhW8MrjdGdRlQSS.description: Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

J1HcaTe5BjGFYDgL.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

s9Lpslvp7eJbAjWr.name: Redirect Fire
s9Lpslvp7eJbAjWr.description:
Trigger A creature within 100 feet casts a fire spell, or a fire spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet.

Effect The dragon makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster.

j7Nh5AH6RZ2HuPM1.name: Breath Weapon
j7Nh5AH6RZ2HuPM1.description:
The dragon breathes a blast of flame that deals [[/r {20d6}[fire]]]{20d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60]{60-foot cone} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

ZuFNPk5MmcRIzGRR.name: Draconic Frenzy
ZuFNPk5MmcRIzGRR.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.

p5WXqIz3tJJCdoiz.name: Draconic Momentum
p5WXqIz3tJJCdoiz.description: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike.

zxL9Jy3Yap38BQBi.name: Manipulate Flames
zxL9Jy3Yap38BQBi.description:
The red dragon attempts to take control of a magical fire or a fire spell within 100 feet.

If it succeeds at a counteract check (counteract level 10, counteract modifier +32), the original caster loses control of the spell or magic fire, control is transferred to the dragon, and the dragon counts as having @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustained the Spell} with this action (if applicable). The dragon can choose to end the spell instead of taking control, if it chooses.

Ancient Red Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 古红龙施法者 Ancient Red Dragon (Spellcaster)
Ancient Red Dragon (Spellcaster).allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

No matter the locale, red dragons sleep on a litter of coins and other treasures, which they zealously guard. Sometimes, the dragon's internal heat causes these precious metals to fuse together.

While there are many types of dragons, from the powerful planar dragons to the strange esoteric dragons, few dragon varieties are as well-known and as rightly feared as the chromatic dragons. Differentiated by the hue of their scales, each color of dragon unleashes its own flavor of murderous cruelty-be it by claw, tooth, or breath-and unlike most creatures, dragons only become more powerful as they age. Their lust for treasure, food, bloodshed, and control are legendary. Physically powerful with egos to match, these dragons are often morally depraved and act as criminal masterminds, vicious tyrants, or voracious raiders.

y3WGfwZSPUcdAfcZ.name: 暗示术(随意施法) Suggestion (At Will)
y3WGfwZSPUcdAfcZ.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

rrgWq5ZjlViY9gU0.name: 火墙术(随意施法) Wall of Fire (At Will)
rrgWq5ZjlViY9gU0.description:
你创造一面火焰墙壁，它会灼烧穿过它的生物。你创造至多60尺长的10尺高5尺厚的直线型火焰墙壁，或者5尺厚，10尺半径10尺高环形火焰。该墙无论哪种形态均为竖直墙；如果你想的话，墙的高度可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。任何穿过该墙或者在回合开始时占据墙的区域的生物承受4d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d6。

LOK7NfaxSYvS9eyQ.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
LOK7NfaxSYvS9eyQ.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

LfhW8MrjdGdRlQSS.name: Smoke Vision
LfhW8MrjdGdRlQSS.description: Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

J1HcaTe5BjGFYDgL.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

s9Lpslvp7eJbAjWr.name: Redirect Fire
s9Lpslvp7eJbAjWr.description:
Trigger A creature within 100 feet casts a fire spell, or a fire spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet.

Effect The dragon makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster.

j7Nh5AH6RZ2HuPM1.name: Breath Weapon
j7Nh5AH6RZ2HuPM1.description:
The dragon breathes a blast of flame that deals [[/r {20d6}[fire]]]{20d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60]{60-foot cone} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

zxL9Jy3Yap38BQBi.name: Manipulate Flames
zxL9Jy3Yap38BQBi.description:
The red dragon attempts to take control of a magical fire or a fire spell within 100 feet.

If it succeeds at a counteract check (counteract level 10, counteract modifier +32), the original caster loses control of the spell or magic fire, control is transferred to the dragon, and the dragon counts as having @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustained the Spell} with this action (if applicable). The dragon can choose to end the spell instead of taking control, if it chooses.

Ancient Silver Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 古银龙施法者 Ancient Silver Dragon (Spellcaster)
Ancient Silver Dragon (Spellcaster).allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Ancient Silver Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
Silver dragons are among the most chivalrous of all dragonkind; they wield frost and cold as weapons, can walk on clouds, and dwell high upon snowy mountain peaks or deep in steep, misty valleys. Although they typically make their lairs among the highlands, the pursuit of justice leads silver dragons to travel far and wide-often into the very heart of realms overrun by evil. These exemplars of righteousness are ceaseless in their determination to help the weak, spread honor, and stamp out evil.

Silver dragons are sleek and sinuous. Their hides resemble nothing so much as a suit of gleaming armor, lending further credence to the popular myth that silver dragons are the paladins of dragonkind. The zeal with which they seek out, confront, and defeat evil is unsurpassed even among their metallic cousins, and they adhere to strict codes of honor usually passed down from parent to hatchling. On occasion, they instead learn these codes from trusted mentors, usually other silver dragons or gold dragons. As they age, they become even more dedicated to their codes, often adding new and even more restrictive clauses to the systems that guide their behavior.

Silver dragons are incredibly altruistic and regularly consort with the citizens of goodly societies, of which they consider themselves protectors and guides. In addition to responding to evil threats, silver dragons work to prevent evil from taking root in the first place, and they ensure mortals under their care are well fed, educated, and treated with dignity. Although silver dragons can seem overzealous or even eager to join the fight against evil, they know that the best way to rid the world of corruption is to stamp out strife and disillusionment at their source, not to passively sit back and watch it grow into an unsolvable problem. Silver dragons can be vindictive, but they can also be forgiving; for evildoers who seek to atone for their sins and turn over a new leaf, the support of a silver dragon is both unwavering and invaluable.

Many silver dragons are also drawn to religious endeavors, venerating deities such as Iomedae, Sarenrae, and other deities concerned with justice, virtue, and redemption.

Paragons of virtue, nobility, and grace, metallic dragons are benevolent entities revered as mythic beings akin to gods in both their power and majesty. Few have ever seen a metallic dragon firsthand, but tales of their intervention in mortals' lives-and of their passing-always spread far and wide. Named for the way their scales resemble the shining metals humanoids use in commerce, warfare, and industry, these immense beings are diverse in their interests and abilities, and they don't seem to mind being associated with such mundane materials. After all, to compare a gold dragon to a gold coin is like comparing an ocean to a glass of water-though they may seem similar at first glance, the raw power, breadth, and grandeur of one simply overwhelms the other.

In addition to metallic dragons and their chromatic counterparts, other types of dragons roam the world and the rest of the multiverse. In the legendary lands of Tian Xia on the other side of the globe are the imperial dragons, serpentine beings who protect the cosmic balance and defend their ancient homeland. Outside the Material Plane, primal dragons such as the domineering brine dragon and reclusive cloud dragon shape the nature and goings-on of the Elemental Planes. Countless other types of dragons are sure to exist, including dragons on far-flung planes of existence and, it is rumored, primeval dragons who soar between the stars.

gxIOvyTGAnM1Qz8r.name: 卜筮术 Augury
gxIOvyTGAnM1Qz8r.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

8WQwygzmnLFUnRlx.name: 侦测阵营(仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (Evil Only)
8WQwygzmnLFUnRlx.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

9otHcksijcCEAOuu.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
9otHcksijcCEAOuu.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

QySe64WqYlaY7p5g.name: Cloud Walk
QySe64WqYlaY7p5g.description: The silver dragon can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground.

kgt9znbnxYGyxtvV.name: Fog Vision
kgt9znbnxYGyxtvV.description: The silver dragon ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from fog and clouds.

AWTYToB1yUp2T16A.name: Cold Aura
AWTYToB1yUp2T16A.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

[[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold damage}

The silver dragon can turn this aura on or off as a single action, which has the concentrate trait, and can choose not to affect allies within the aura.

RoHDkOS2aYfoab02.name: Reflect Spell
RoHDkOS2aYfoab02.description:
Trigger The silver dragon critically succeeds at a saving throw against a spell, or a caster trying to target the dragon critically fails their attack roll.

Effect The spell is reflected back upon the caster, with the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{Spell Turning}.

aQJcYgTKQBvgKvIv.name: Wing Deflection
aQJcYgTKQBvgKvIv.description:
Trigger The silver dragon is targeted with an attack

Effect The dragon raises its wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the dragon is flying, it descends 10 feet after the attack is complete.

uT8zq93Vx5vOdzkD.name: Breath Weapon
uT8zq93Vx5vOdzkD.description:
The silver dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Frost The dragon breathes a cloud of frost in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50|traits:arcane,cold,evocation,damaging-effect] that deals [[/r {20d6}[cold]]]{20d6 cold damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true] save).
  • Paralyzing Gas The dragon breathes a blast of paralyzing gas. Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:50|traits:arcane,enchantment,incapacitation] must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round (or 3 rounds on a critical failure).

Ancient White Dragon.name: 古白龙 Ancient White Dragon
Ancient White Dragon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Ancient White Dragon.publicNotes:
The most feral and least intelligent of all the chromatic dragons, white dragons are brutish, predatory, and chiefly motivated by self-preservation. Nearly all other dragons look down on white dragons as hopelessly hotheaded and dull, though this does not make them any less dangerous-in fact, it may mean the opposite. It's nearly impossible to treat with white dragons, not because they lack the capacity to do so, but because they just don't care to. They are as difficult to deal with as they are quick to anger, and they become incensed at almost anything. When a white dragon does speak, it spews threats, inane jokes, and incoherent babbling as a prelude to attacking-and when the attack comes, it's bloody and relentless.

Thankfully, white dragons prefer very cold, remote locations that are far from people. Dwelling on glacial mountaintops or in ice caverns beneath forbidding tundra, they treat the lands around them as their own personal hunting grounds. They fly out to feed or terrorize other creatures, especially those who trespass near the dragon's territory, then bring any treasure back to be displayed in icy niches in their lairs. They collect all kinds of valuables, with a slight preference for items with high utility-such as tools, trade goods, and fine food-over coins or jewels. The ability to shape ice lets white dragons rearrange their lairs exactly to their specifications, and they take great pride in how they've decorated their homes over the years.

While there are many types of dragons, from the powerful planar dragons to the strange esoteric dragons, few dragon varieties are as well-known and as rightly feared as the chromatic dragons. Differentiated by the hue of their scales, each color of dragon unleashes its own flavor of murderous cruelty-be it by claw, tooth, or breath-and unlike most creatures, dragons only become more powerful as they age. Their lust for treasure, food, bloodshed, and control are legendary. Physically powerful with egos to match, these dragons are often morally depraved and act as criminal masterminds, vicious tyrants, or voracious raiders.

qAZd9xSWWwAjD8tO.name: 冰墙术(随意施法) Wall of Ice (At Will)
qAZd9xSWWwAjD8tO.description:
你构造一面由冰组成的屏障，它能阻挡视线，并且在被破坏后也能冻结敌人。你创造至多60尺长的1尺厚10尺高冰墙（该墙壁无需是竖直的，但两边必须固定到固体表面上）或者1尺厚10尺半径的半球形。这面冰组成的墙壁是不透明的。如果你想的话，该墙壁的长度，高度，半径都可以更小。

你必须将该墙放在连续的开放空间中，令其边界不会穿过任何生物或者物体，否则你会失去该法术。每一段10尺乘10尺的墙壁具有AC10，硬度10，以及40生命值，并且它免疫重击，寒冷伤害，以及精准伤害。这样的一段墙也具有对火焰弱点15；被火焰摧毁的墙壁会融化或升华，变为水和蒸气。一段被其他方法摧毁的墙会留下一团寒冷的冰块，它是困难地形，并且会对穿过的生物造成2d6寒冷伤害。

升阶 (+2) 每一段墙的生命值增加10，并且对穿过被摧毁部分生物造成的寒冷伤害增加1d6。

MEF840zKnNuFMJEz.name: 隐雾术(随意施法) Obscuring Mist (At Will)
MEF840zKnNuFMJEz.description: 你唤来一团迷雾。在雾中的所有生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，并且在雾外的所有生物对其内的生物获得隐蔽。你可以解消这团云雾。

c31tqgUkSZeM5KZJ.name: 造风术(随意施法) Gust of Wind (At Will)
c31tqgUkSZeM5KZJ.description:
一团暴风从你的掌中喷出，从你施放法术时所在位置直吹到线形终点。这团风吹灭所有小的非魔法火焰，吹散云和雾，吹起负载轻或者更低的物体，并且会推动更大的物体。区域中大型或者更小的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。在之后进入风中的大型或者更小的生物也必须在进入时尝试该豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物无法顶风移动。

失败 该生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。如果它在飞行，它改为承受大失败效果。

大失败 该生物被沿风向推离30尺，倒地，并且承受2d6钝击伤害。

0bcvSP6hBMQd3ATb.name: Snow Vision
0bcvSP6hBMQd3ATb.description: Snow doesn't impair a white dragon's vision; it ignores concealment from snowfall.

VONgaGyF9aRjoaok.name: Blizzard
VONgaGyF9aRjoaok.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

After the dragon uses its Breath Weapon, a fierce blizzard of blinding snow surrounds its body for 1 round. Everything in the aura is diffcult terrain for other creatures that are on the ground, climbing, or flying. The blowing snow also makes all creatures in the area @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. While the blizzard rages, the dragon's dragon chill extends to the full area of the blizzard.

Hrk3kc8RGNxK9XoN.name: Freezing Blood
Hrk3kc8RGNxK9XoN.description:
Trigger An adjacent creature deals piercing or slashing damage to the dragon.

Effect The dragon's blood sprays on the creature, dealing [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold damage}. A creature that takes cold damage in this way is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

DiC6r2dHBydpjZtt.name: Breath Weapon
DiC6r2dHBydpjZtt.description:
The dragon breathes a cloud of frost that deals [[/r {16d6}[cold]]]{16d6 cold damage} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50]{50-foot cone} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

r5JyVLxepP2bpNAq.name: Draconic Frenzy
r5JyVLxepP2bpNAq.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order

0IoDOGJ3snGokTeZ.name: Draconic Momentum
0IoDOGJ3snGokTeZ.description: When the dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges its Breath Weapon

AIcffB6vSk2oEmqt.name: Ground Slam
AIcffB6vSk2oEmqt.description:
The dragon slams into the ground. It can do this if it's on the ground or Flying within 10 feet of the ground. Each creature on the ground within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save or fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and take [[/r {5d6}[bludgeoning]]]{5d6 bludgeoning damage}.

The dragon can then Step.

ZktMGhL2mkH1daBn.name: Ice Climb
ZktMGhL2mkH1daBn.description: A white dragon can climb on ice as though it had the listed climb Speed. It ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and doesn't risk falling when crossing ice.

fm9psBEIByOlaBKs.name: Shape Ice
fm9psBEIByOlaBKs.description:
The dragon reshapes a cube of ice or snow it touches, up to 10 feet across. Any creature standing atop the ice must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save or @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:15] check.

On a failure, the creature falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} atop the ice; on a critical failure, it falls off the ice entirely and is also prone.

Ancient Silver Dragon.name: 古银龙 Ancient Silver Dragon
Ancient Silver Dragon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Ancient Silver Dragon.publicNotes:
